scripts.dev:services: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:property"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:services: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../property-service && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../property-service && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:services: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run test && cd ../user-service && npm run test && cd ../property-service && npm run test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:services: cd backend/api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../user-service && npm run lint && cd ../property-service && npm run lint
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend/user-service && npm run db:migrate && cd ../property-service && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: cd backend/user-service && npm run db:seed && cd ../property-service && npm run db:seed
